name: Building Upon Them
description:
Building Upon Them is a puzzle platformer in which you use dead bodies from previous test subjects to help SCIENCE through finishing the experiment.

Move through the levels, dodging or using obstacles to traverse the level, and reach the end goal, while managing your lives and items.

Source code: https://github.com/ArmagdoGaming/Building-Upon-Them

This game has been rushed, and I mean rushed because of stuff happening IRL, but I might come back later to it.

Font used in-game is: VT323

This is the first game I've ever made, so constructive criticism is welcome.
